tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE food_nutrition (
    food_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_name STRING,
    calories INT,
    protein DOUBLE,
    carbohydrates DOUBLE,
    fat DOUBLE
);

CREATE TABLE food_items (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  calories INT,
  protein FLOAT,
  carbohydrates FLOAT,
  fat FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE food_items (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    calories INT,
    protein FLOAT,
    carbohydrates FLOAT,
    fat FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE item_categories (
    item_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (item_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES food_items(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES food_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE foods (
    food_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_name TEXT,
    calories INT,
    protein DOUBLE,
    carbs DOUBLE,
    fats DOUBLE
)

CREATE TABLE categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE food_categories (
    food_id INT,
    category_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE food_nutrients (
    food_id INT,
    nutrient_name TEXT,
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE food_items (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   calories INT,
   protein DECIMAL(5,2),
   carbohydrates DECIMAL(5,2),
   fats DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE food_item_categories (
   food_item_id INT,
   category_id INT,
   PRIMARY KEY (food_item_id, category_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (food_item_id) REFERENCES food_items(id),
   FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES food_categories(id)
);

CREATE TABLE food_item_tags (
   food_item_id INT,
   tag_id INT,
   PRIMARY KEY (food_item_id, tag_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (food_item_id) REFERENCES food_items(id),
   FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES food_tags(id)
);
